text: Anyone have any examples on how they plan to use the new multi-level dynamic pages functionality? Break apart a large HubDB table (like a resource center) into smaller tables by category to make it easier to maintain? I would be curious to hear how and why others plan to use it vs the previous options...

Anyone have any examples on how they plan to use the new multi-level dynamic pages functionality? Break apart a large HubDB table (like a resource center) into smaller tables by category to make it easier to maintain? I would be curious to hear how and why others plan to use it vs the previous options... <https://designers.HubSpot.com/how-to-build-multilevel-dynamic-templates>

The reason I built this was because I saw examples of users segmenting their tables into multiple tables, and having to maintain 1 page per table even though each page used the same template. It would be a lot easier in this case to connect all those tables together using a parent table and creating 1 page that can power any number of dynamic pages across multiple tables
